pages.text: The Ward Crystal protects you from magic damage, but also reduces the magic damage you deal.
$(l)Default Attribute modifiers:$()$(br)$(2)+75%$() Magic Damage Reduction$(br)$(4)-75%$() Magic Damage$(br)

The Ward Crystal supports the following enchantments:$(br2)$(l)Protection$(): Further reduces magic damage dealt and taken$(br2)$(l)Curse of Chromatic Twisting$(): Removes the penalty to magic damage dealt, however taking non-magic damage inflicts Weakness II
$(o)It looks like an amethyst, but is in fact just some crystallized sunscreen with an added dose of Fermented Spider Eye.
